title: tUgidaLE rangana
sahitya:
tUgidarerangana tUgidare krSNana tUgidare acyutAnandana


anupallavi

  tUgidare varagiriyappa timmappana tUgidare kAvEr rangayyana


caraNam 1    nAgalOkadalli nArAyaNa malagyAne nAga kannikeyaru tUgire 
nAgavENiyaru nENu piDidu koNDu bEgane toTTila tUgire
    caraNam 2    indralOkadallupEndra malagihane indu mukhiyarella tUgire 
indra kannikeyaru candadi bandu mukundana toTTila tUgire
    caraNam 3    Aladeleya mEle shrIlOla malagihane nIlakuntaLeyoLutUgire 
vyALashayana hari malagu malagu endu bAla krSNanayya tUgire
    caraNam 4    sAsira nAmane sarvOttamanendu sUsutta toTTila tUgire 
lEsAgi maDuvinoL shESana tuLadiTTa dOSa vidUrana tUgire
    caraNam 5    araLale mAkAyi koraLa muttina hAra taraLana toTTila tUgire 
siridEvi ramaNane purandara viTTalane karuNadi malagendu tUgire
